title: Stimulus generalization occurs when an organism

content.question: In classical conditioning, stimulus generalization occurs when an organism responds

choices.label: to stimuli that are similar to the conditioned stimulus
to stimuli that are similar to the unconditioned stimulus
to the conditioned stimulus the same way as to the unconditioned stimulus
with different types of responses to neutral stimuli

content.answer: to stimuli that are similar to the conditioned stimulus

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
